name: AID1
description: You have truly outdone yourself by capping the enemy's maximum threat value. Survive this wave and obtain the award.

name: AID2
description: Master the art of Industrial development while lava falls. Be awarded for enduring 250 cycles on Hardcore mode in a single game.

name: AID3
description: Those who dare to utter the word "Turtle" to a Juggernaut will find themselves deep in the abyss. Dubbed by the enemy while observing a Commander constantly teleporting it. Obtain award with a Juggernaut's Mark 1 promotion and surviving the wave.

name: AID4
description: Achieve by having the maximum capacity of Utility drones (25), all on the terrain at once.

name: AID5
description: Obtain a deeper understanding of the RECOGs and the industrial process through the extensive Wiki within the game. Marked by the many "?", view at least 100 different Wiki pages in a single game.

name: AID6
description: Obtain this achievement by the mishaps of lava management. Awarded upon the destruction of the Main Depository by lava.

name: AID7
description: Unlock each item from the Research and Development Tree for this award.

name: AID8
description: The Thermal expert achievement award, is granted based your expertise in Lava management. Obtained by pumping or draining 100 Lava units in a single game.

name: AID9
description: Not friendly nor enemy can run from an M.M.B.H. missile. As consolation for one of your own, zapped to oblivion, here is your award.

name: AID10
description: Awarded for your efforts in the time and dedication in creating the most powerful B.O.M.S. missile in the game. Use the Nuke for this achievement.

name: AID11
description: Granted to the player who successfully adapts an F-slot: Drone Signature Fitting Module, to any drone type.

name: AID12
description: How low can you go? Reach down to the farthest depths of the terrain with a Utility drone, and not only be awarded unlimited lava, but this achievement as well.

name: AID13
description: The Thermal fusion device can only guarantee the act of cooling lava, but to cool lava and get the Lyotribillium mineral? Now that is luck! You deserve an award for that find.

name: AID14
description: You are a Manufacturing machine by building all possible depositories in a single game.

name: AID15
description: This achievement is granted upon the successful creation of a second Mainframe Depository.

name: AID16
description: Even the lights back on Earth dim when 100000 power is available. Ensure this enormous power supply is connected, and be rewarded.

name: AID17
description: Wave upon wave, you conquer deep space. No matter how strong the enemy gets, you are always stronger. This achievement goes to enduring 1000 cycles in a single, non-peaceful game.

name: AID18
description: Any Defender who survives long enough to earn the Mark 1 promotion, and keep it for the remainder of the wave deserves the call sign DINDY: "Did Not Die Yet".

name: AID19
description: The Warmachine holds back no tears for its killing. It will earn the call sign WHAM: "Without any mercy", upon a Mark 1 promotion and keeping it for the remainder of the wave.

name: AID20
description: The Scout's relentless targeting strategy always catches the enemy off guard, rightfully earning the call sign B-DOWN: "Bottom's Down". Awarded upon a Mark 1 promotion, and kept for the remainder of the wave.

name: AID21
description: Any enemy, who faces off with a Mark 1 Tank, is known to eventually run home crying to their mama. The call sign "MAMA” is awarded when the Tank retains a Mark 1 promotion at the end of the wave.

name: AID22
description: Upon reaching Mark 1 promotion and holding it at the end of the wave, the Commander awards itself the call sign "Chickpea". Unfortunately, it is to remind scientists that they are merely tiny peas compared to its might, and will find out upon its return.

name: AID23
description: Obtain this achievement after killing 250 enemies in a single game.

name: AID24
description: Unfortunately losing 250 of your own drones does not feel good. Here is an award to make you feel better.

name: AID25
description: The ground shakes as you turn the terrain to dust. Dig out from underneath and have the terrain fall on its own. Do this 100 times in a single game for the reward. Be careful you are not under it when it does fall or you can be crushed.

name: AID26
description: Mindful of efficiency and repetition. Create and save a blueprint.

name: AID27
description: One drone, two drones, three drones, four. Five drones, six drones out the depot door. Collect this award upon all six drones active on the battlefield at one time.

name: AID28
description: Awarded for your determination to building the most advanced industrial complex possible. With 250 constructs built and placed on the map, you have achieved a great understanding for industrial harmony. Protect it well.

name: AID29
description: The Golden dozer achievement belongs to the player who knows that the terrain is not simply a pile of rocks. It is a source of power and protection against a very strong enemy. Dig deep, dig wide. Dig 500 cells in a single game for this award.

name: AID30
description: This achievement is not for the risk-taker, it is for the one who dips their toes in the water before jumping. It is for the one who uses the discover command on 250 cells in a single game. A tactic to avoiding boring holes in lava-filled caves.

name: AID31
description: The Utility drones do not exactly whistle while they work, but they are truly dedicated to the cause. Programmed to gather collectables is one of their primary functions. Use the collect command 1000 times in a single game for this achievement.

name: AID32
description: Hoarding is an art form, and in an environment where part of the goal is to collect all that you can, this achievement encourages it. Collect at least 1 of every: Oid, Mineral, Element, Binary Agent and Component to be honored with the Hoarder award.

name: AID33
description: Skilled in the art of RECOG warfare, and enough space on a drone's body for 100 victory tallies, this achievement goes to the drone who owns space supremacy by killing 100 enemies.

name: AID34
description: Friendly fire is not usually a planned strategy, although sacrificing one for the win can provide the advantage. Awarded on the action of a friendly drone taking out another friendly drone.

name: AID35
description: The industrial process runs on an immense scale, from teleportation systems to thermal fusion lava ways, as well as the elaborate processing of the depots. Produce 1000 of any item in a single game to show your in-depth knowledge of production and usage.

name: AID36
description: Convince the scientists that they have chosen the wrong person in charge of Mission Control Auxiliary, by causing a game over before the end of the first cycle. For this action, you are awarded the highly coveted Wasted achievement.

name: AID37
description: Achiever, go-getter, ambitious and all the other words in between to describe the one who enjoys the feeling of being promoted over and over again. Have your drones promoted 100 times in a single game for that great pat on the back and this award.

name: AID38
description: Conquer the skies and let it rain...fragments that is. Each enemy kill will drop some fragments to the terrain. Kill enough enemy and have them drop 500 fragments in a single, non-peaceful game for this achievement.

name: AID39
description: Can you survive 10 waves in a single game? Awarded with the Tactician achievement for all who do.

name: AID40
description: In charge and in control. Master the game's building process, including those locked and those whose pieces are extremely hard to find. Receive this achievement for your efforts in building at least 1 of each construct in a single game.

name: AID41
description: Superiority favors firepower among the RECOGs. Stand your ground and push the enemy back with missiles equipped to capable drones. 100 equipped missiles will not only give you a strong offense, but this award as well.

name: AID42
description: You have played the game for hundreds of hours and have memorized the rules for next week's pop quiz. It is your turn now to change them. Show off your skills as recipe master and modify the rules to your liking for this achievement.

name: AID43
description: The dust settles over a mountainous landscape while the gleam of Yetrinium minerials shine back at you. You are at peace knowing there is no threat. You also have not realized playing 250 cycles on peaceful mode in a single game. Here is your reward.

name: AID44
description: Defender drones are the first line defense. When promoted, their strength and might enhance. Be brave, stand tall and pierce through the RECOG of a Mark 1 Defender taking it out. Kill one for this award.

name: AID45
description: Have you felt the force of a Mark 1 Warmachine yet? Its capability of unleashing 1000% missile rate of fire may have you shaking in your boots. Courage to face against one and succeed will win the day, and this achievement.

name: AID46
description: Bull's eye! Achieve bragging rights by out-sniping a sniper. The Mark 1 Scout can sense you, kill you, and disappear without you ever knowing it was there. Get one first and merit this award.

name: AID47
description: You have surely earned this achievement if you manage to take out a Mark 1 Tank. Robust, aggressive and fearless, this drone will very likely not make it easy for you to do so.

name: AID48
description: This trained intelligence military drone will have you thinking repeatedly, strategies to fight against the army it leads. Outwit its RECOG and kill the Mark 1 Commander for this achievement.

name: AID49
description: Go ahead; take on a Mark 1 Juggernaut. Can you crush the Turtle and bring home the prize?

name: AID50
description: Each drone knows its limit and the buttons to push beyond that. Know these buttons as defined by Military Drone Skills and manually use them all in a single game to achieve this reward.

name: AID51
description: The mighty have fallen by the hand of a lonely drone. Not even the Juggernaut can withstand the force of being crushed by a construct. Set traps for the enemy and have them die by allowing the industry to do the work for you to receive this award.

name: AID52
description: With the power of weaponized lava, comes great responsibility. Highly unstable, yet very effective. Although if you happen to mess it up and liquify yourself until death, here's your achievement.

name: AID53
description: Mastery of defensive manoeuvres prove that you have not only understood the use of structures, but the ability to manipulate lava as a as a form of supplemental defense. Have lava cover available paths while being boxed under structural barriers.

name: AID54
description: Congratulations!! By unlocking every achievement possible, you have successfully mastered the operations of the RECOG project. Carry this award with pride, as you have earned it.

name: AID55
description: Adding mines and turrets to your defensives will ensure a greater success percentage. Kill 100 enemies this way, and it will ensure your reward.

name: AID56
description: With new features added to this game, we encourage players to partake and help in the development process by playing the BETA versions. To show our thanks, we award you.

name: AID57
description: One shot one kill is usually a term we like to hear. Although not when it is against our only means of progress. There, there, wipe your tears with this award if you let your Utility drone die in one hit.

name: AID58
description: Fast drones can remove themselves by flying away from dangerous situations; smart drones do it in style. Have the Commander use the Teleport skill 100 times in a single game for this award.

name: AID59
description: As hard as it is to take down a Juggernaut, it may happen, and worse, it may be your own. Do not let the humiliation go unnoticed. Automate the Particle Pulse skill, and win this award if you take that sucker down with you.

name: AID60
description: You know its coming…you have witnessed the enemy's army growing...it's only a matter of time...the Juggernaut has arrived! Can you last the wave defeat the entire army, including the Juggernaut to claim this prize.
